mapper.insert: insert into menu (menuNumber, menuName, menuPrice, menuFile, menuCategory, menuOption, memberNumber) values (#{menuNumber}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuFile}, #{menuCategory}, #{menuOption}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.update: update member set menuName = #{menuName}, menuPrice = #{menuPrice}, menuFile=#{menuFile}, menuCategory = #{menuCategory}, menuOption = #{menuOption} where memberNumber = #{memberNumber}
